event.title: From Design Fiction to Invented Futures
event.description:
We thought we could go as a group to the Invented Futures event on Thursday November 7 and perhaps have more drinks together after the event. The Invented Futures event follows on nicely from Judith Mühlenhoff's talk, "Design Fiction: Beyond Flying Cars and Robots Taking Over" at the Anthropology + Technology Conference (https://www.anthtechconf.co.uk/pechakucha/judith-muhlenhoff).

Get your free ticket to Invented Futures here: https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/invented-futures-tickets-73581469155.

"When we talk about technology, we’re really talking about ourselves. Emerging tech has become a container for our anxieties about future ways of living. What stories do we tell ourselves about tech, and how do these narratives shape our futures?"
